body_content.explanation: A bi-curious person is romantically or sexually attracted to people of their own gender and people of a different gender, but they do not identify as bisexual:
examples: Someone who previously identified as heterosexual but is interested in exploring relationships with people of their own gender may choose to describe themselves as bicurious.
I knew she was bi-curious a year ago when she told me that one of her female co-workers was flirting with her and she enjoyed it.
